title: was just called a "fa ggot" in game BUT
body:
54367

riot has never punished anyone who has ever said that or anything else to me in game so I didn't bother reporting him.  

FYI, last season I reported a lot of people, NONE of which was ever punished BUT I got placed on their "fu ck this guy" list and had to hard carry every single ranked game I won because they put me with the worst people in the game (pretty sure it's because they didn't like that I reported people for trolling).  

This season I have only reported one person because my nephew wanted me to, the people I'm matched with are Not even close to as bad as last season.  Riot doesn't punish trolls they punish the ones who GET trolled.
